metadata.title: CVE-2022-28288 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Mozilla developers and community members Randell Jesup, Sebastian Hengst,and the Mozilla Fuzzing Team reported memory safety bugs present in Firefox98. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presumethat with enough effort some of these could have been exploited to runarbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 99.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
